nodes.text: Conil Barje was a Human male from Corellia.

Conil sold all his possessions in order to move to Tatooine with his wife Camelle and their new-born child, to live the simple life of moisture farmers. He was killed when Tusken Raiders raided the trading site at Mochot Steep. He was hit in the back of his head with a gaderffii and it snapped his neck.
